settings.title: Reach out
settings.paragraph: Have a question? or have a service you need. Choose an option that suites you or send us an enquiry. Our team is ready to get you started.

settings.title: Team Match
settings.paragraph: Based on your enquiry we will assign a dedicated project manager matched to assist you, they take the time to ensure your needs are taken care of.

settings.title: Get started
settings.paragraph: You are in good hands. With your dedicated project manager, the sky is the limit, they will be there every step of the way to see that your project is complete.

settings.title: We create Shopify Ecommerce solutions.
settings.paragraph: Wether you want to built a new ecommerce store, migrate from a different platform, or need to upgrade your current site. We are here to help you succeed.

settings.title: We speak, eat, sleep Shopify
settings.paragraph: We have extensive Shopify experience and have developed ecommerce stores and solutions for our clients worldwide. Whether you want to built a new ecommerce store, migrate, or help with your current store. We are here to help you succeed.

settings.title: Why we choose Shopify
settings.paragraph: Over 1 million merchants across 175 countries agree with us and trust Shopify to run their stores. Here's why we think it's the right platform for you too...
settings.list:
Easy to use

Great support

Multi-payment gateway integration

Tracking and maintaining customer data

Across-channel selling

Analytics reporting

Built-in cart abandonment feature

Optimized for SEO, easily customizable keywords

Integrations made easy

settings.title: Basic
settings.subtitle: For personal or small start-up ecommerce sites with a simple responsive design.
settings.feature_4: Basic Pages Setup (homepage / contact / policies pages)

settings.title: Advanced
settings.subtitle: For professional or medium size ecommerce sites with a unique responsive design.
settings.feature_2: Custom Page set-up (About, Shipping, Blog, FAQ etc.)

settings.title: Pro
settings.subtitle: For well established or large size ecommerce sites with a custom responsive design.
settings.feature_2: Premium pages (3 extra pages with custom layouts)

settings.title: Find a plan that suites your needs.
settings.paragraph: Get the best ecommerce store to suite your needs.

settings.title: Introduction & strategy phase
settings.paragraph: This is when we take the time to understand your vision & needs. We are all ears and ready to make your vision and ideas a reality. At this phase the more informatoin you share with us the better. We then put together a plan of action, specific to your requirements.

settings.title: Feedback stage
settings.paragraph: We are dedicated in building your perfect website and encourage feedback throughout the project. We put together the proposed mock-ups, and layouts for your website. During this phase you and our team work on and refine the layouts until you are happy with the results.

settings.title: Development stage
settings.paragraph: Our team gets to work on turning your vision into reality. Wether its a store migration, website upgrate or a totally new website. Our team is on it. Ensuring that the development runs smoothly and effectively while keeping you updated throughout the process.

settings.title: Review Stage
settings.paragraph: This phase is critical. Our team goes over the final round of revisions to get everything just right before we launch your site. We go over any changes and adjustments needed encouraging feedback throughout the process. Once every is a go, we move on to our next and final stage.

settings.title: Website Launch
settings.paragraph: All the hard work leads up to this, where we hand over your fully functional, ready to sell, Shopify site. Our team guides you through the website launch process, ensuring that everything is functional and ready for you to start selling right away.

settings.title: We are here every step of the way
settings.paragraph: Our main aim is to develop your powerful website optimized for success. When working with us, you are matched with a designated project manager to ensure all your project needs are taken care of from start to finish.

settings.title: Why work with us
settings.paragraph:
Certified Shopify partner: Luna Lemon is a part of the
Shopify development community with extensive Shopify experience and expertise.
Provide an all-in-one solution: We handle everything in-house,
from developing and designing to grow and maintaining your Shopify store.
Customized themes to fit your needs: We provide custom theme design that will convert visitors into buyers.
Dedicated project manager: We provide a dedicated point of
contact at Luna Lemon to guide you through discovery, design, training, and final site launch.
Experts in eCommerce optimization: In addition to being expert web developers, our SEO Specialists are equipt optimize your online store for better rankings and growth.
